hadiths.text: Jabir narrated that :the Prophet said: "When one of you prostrates, then let him be balanced, and let him not lay his forearms down like the lying of the dog

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الاِعْتِدَالِ فِي السُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Being Balanced During Prostration
